interface.name: org.chromium.ModemManager.Modem.Gobi
interface.tp:docstring: Gobi-specific features for use in test and debugging.

method.name: PowerCycle
method.tp:docstring: Tells the modem to power cycle itself.

method.name: SetCarrier
method.tp:docstring: Prepares the modem to use the given carrier. Modem will reset after this is called.

method.name: SoftReset
method.tp:docstring: Tells the module to do a soft reset and waits for the reset to complete.

method.name: RequestEvents
method.tp:docstring: Requests notification (or not) of a particular event occuring. Multiple notifications may be enabled at the same time.

arg.name: events
arg.tp:docstring: A string describing which events are to be enabled or disabled. This string contains zero or more directives of the form '[+-]event', like '+foo-bar+baz'. Allowable events are currently: dormancy *, meaning all events

method.name: SetAutomaticTracking
method.tp:docstring: Turn automatic tracking on and off

signal.name: DormancyStatus
signal.tp:docstring: Indicates that the dormancy status of the modem changed.

arg.name: dormant
arg.tp:docstring: True if the modem is dormant; false otherwise.
